system.sustained:
The Psyker digs into the mind of the target. Successful opposed Test vs Target's Willpower, probe mind, going one level deeper per round sustained (1-5). Failiure ends power, Psyker gains Fatigue equal to DoF. Probing without Target's Knowledge suffers -20 Penalty to Opposed Willpower Test and limited to Fettered Strength. Probe Levels:
(1 - Basic Info, Name, Mood, Insanity level, physical health),  (2 - Surface Thoughts, fears, concerns, concious lies, Corruption Level),  (3 - Memories of the last 12 Hours, basic Secrets), (4 - Detailed info subject thinks is important, relations, beliefs, personal goals, contacts, hidden ciphers, important life moments), (5 - Depths of target's Psyche, identify implanted memories/personalities)
